title: Dekton 4PC 3" Pro Clamp with 35mm Jaw Opening, Heavy Duty Rubber Non-Slip Grip, Durable Tough Plastic Construction, Hinged Jaws for Improved Grip on Uneven Surfaces, Ideal for Wood & DIY Projects
features: Versatile Clamping: The Dekton 3" Pro Clamp 4 PC features a generous 35mm jaw opening, making it suitable for a wide range of woodworking and DIY projects. Its ability to accommodate various materials ensures a secure hold for your tasks, whether you're assembling furniture or securing parts during cutting.

Durable Construction: Crafted from tough plastic, this pro clamp is designed for heavy-duty use. Its robust build ensures longevity, allowing it to withstand the rigors of frequent use in workshops, garages, or job sites, making it a reliable tool in your collection.

Enhanced Grip: The heavy-duty rubber non-slip grip provides superior comfort and control during use. This feature minimizes hand fatigue, allowing for prolonged clamping without compromising on safety or effectiveness, making your work more efficient.

Hinged Jaws Design: The hinged jaws improve grip on uneven surfaces, providing stability and security even on irregular materials. This design ensures consistent pressure across the surface, preventing slippage and ensuring precise work results.

Easy Operation: The simple one-handed operation allows for quick adjustments and secure clamping, enhancing productivity. Whether you're a professional or a DIY enthusiast, this clamp simplifies your workflow, making it an essential tool for any project.
description: The Dekton 4 PC 3" Pro Clamp is the perfect tool for any woodworking or DIY project, featuring a generous 35mm jaw opening that accommodates a variety of materials. Constructed from tough plastic, this heavy-duty clamp is designed to withstand rigorous use, ensuring long-lasting durability in workshops, garages, or job sites. Its heavy-duty rubber non-slip grip provides enhanced comfort and control, reducing hand fatigue during extended use and allowing for precise clamping without compromising safety. The innovative hinged jaws design ensures a secure grip on uneven surfaces, delivering consistent pressure and preventing slippage, even on irregular materials. Additionally, the clamp's one-handed operation allows for quick adjustments and secure clamping, streamlining your workflow. Whether you're assembling furniture, securing parts during cutting, or tackling intricate projects, the Dekton 9" Pro Clamp is an essential addition to your toolkit, combining functionality, durability, and ease of use for all your clamping needs.
